Description: - Managing real estate development projects for the company.- Manage and control budgets, schedule, and sales.- Create and develop approach to project delivery.- Studying and working on land and real estate projects.- Identify and facilitate improvement opportunities.- Conducting real estate feasibility studies and strategic review.- Conducting studies on job opportunities and suitable places for investment.Skills
Skills: - 5-10 years of previous experience in real estate development in Saudi Arabia
- Full knowledge of the recording of the Wafi program.
- Experience in registering projects for the Ministry of Housing.
- The ability to manage the work team and knowledge of the Real-estate transfer procedures.
